title: MADE Marketing Report
general_instruction: This is a monthly marketing report written for the Chief Marketing Officer. Other audience members include the marketing team.  This should be written in an objective tone with an emphasis on data and analysis.

resources.description: This provides data on budget and spending for advertising. it also lists key takeaways.
data on impressions, clicks, and conversation (among other stats) on the campaign.
insights, results, and recommendations based on data from our advertising over October 2024.
data on page views, time on page, conversaion rate, and traffic source from google analytics.
Data for our marketing metrics is found in here.
performance of target keywords and other data on SEO relevant to our advertising efforts in October 2024.
data on reach, impressions, port types and engagements, and followers per platform

sections.title: Executive Summary
sections.prompt: Summarize the overall performance and highlight key wins or losses in marketing efforts this month. Also include any key points from that should be raised from the other sections of this document.

sections.title: Campaign Performances
sections.prompt: Provide a breakdown of major campaigns, including goals vs actuals, and insights about what worked or didn't.

sections.title: Social Media Overivew
sections.prompt: Summarize growth, engagement, and top-performing content across platforms.

sections.title: Website & SEO Insights
sections.prompt: Analyze traffic trends, top landing pages, and any SEO gains/losses.

sections.title: Next Month's Focus Areas
sections.prompt: Based on this month's insights, suggest priorities and key activities for next month.  Please synthesize from data and resources in the prior sections
